text: Zygmunt Grodner was a fencer and physician from Poland. Grodner competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics. He was born on 12 January 1932.Zygmunt Grodner == References == Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish fencers Category:Olympians for Poland Category:Sportspeople from Warsaw Category:Polish physicians
title: Zygmunt Grodner
